title: You’re Watching Their Collapse (Ep 1726)
description:
In this episode, I address the catastrophic meltdown on the Left over this new law. 
I also explain why the Russians are struggling to advance their war efforts. 

News Picks:

Russia is having major logistics problems in Ukraine. 

Crazed Russian MP calls for a nuclear strike on the United States.


Lincoln Project clown hilariously compared himself to freedom fighter in Russia.

Despite the lying about the Florida Parental Rights bill, a majority supports it.


Did China steal a sensitive spying tool from the NSA?
